About Me

BIO

Hi.My name is Dheker L'abidi, I'm 23 years old and I'm from Tunisia. Currently I'm at my 3rd and final year studying Computer Science at National Engineering School of Carthage (Enicarthage). I have always been curious and eager to learn new skills so that I can develop my own theories. I can say that I'm a Math fan-boy, with some coding techniques and engineering Skills, That One day will help shape the future of AI thus mankind's as Well.

Telnet Innovation Labs Engineering Internship

A 2 month internship, in which i developed a Sentimental Analysis plateforme for Social Media Users.

Key Technologies: NodeJs,ReactJs,Mongo ATLAS, Python(FastText, Seq2Seq LSTM Model).

Tunisie Telecom Summer Internship

A 1 month Internship, in which i worked on a WebSite for the sole purpose of Managing Energy&Environment Department equipment.

Key Technologies: HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, JS, PHP7, Mysql.
